actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $750 in all cases the amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $750 the amount of the lump-sum death payment under title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $750 in all cases the amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.
